tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (RB First) (DT a) (NN friend)) (PP (IN with) (NP (NP (JJ terminal) (NN brain) (NN cancer)) (, ,) (ADVP (RB now)) (NP (DT another) (NN friend))))) (VP (VP (VBZ has) (VP (VBN suffered) (NP (DT a) (JJ major) (NN stroke)))) (CC and) (VP (VBZ is) (ADJP (JJ unlikely) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB recover)))))))))
